mapper.insert: insert into productService(id, name, picture, description, productSerivceSpace, productSpace, touchPointSpace, customerSpace, actorSpace, societySpace, contextSpace, timeSpace, environmentSpace, lastModifiedUser, lastModifiedDate, createdUser, createdDate) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{picture}, #{desc}, #{productSerivceSpace}, #{productSpace}, #{touchPointSpace}, #{customerSpace}, #{actorSpace}, #{societySpace}, #{contextSpace}, #{timeSpace}, #{environmentSpace}, #{lastModifiedUser}, #{lastModifiedDate}, #{createdUser}, #{createdDate})
